channel.title: Steam Version - Crash on changing multiplayer skin
channel.description: In-map singleplayer, went to the menu and changed multiplayer skin twice before a crash without notice. crash_bms.exe_20150505233542_1.zip (36.6 KB).dmp is zipped to be allowed as an attachment.[/attach]

item.description:

item.title: Steam Version - Crash on changing multiplayer skin
item.dc:creator: striker
item.description:
Same problem for me. Was ingame SP, switched to menu and started selecting skins when it crashed.

Oh and please include *.dmp files as attachments.

crash_bms.exe_20150507182321_1.dmp.zip (42.1 KB)

Read full topic
